statements: SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, gender, date_of_birth FROM patients;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM providers;
SELECT service_name, service_date FROM services;
SELECT * FROM services WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, gender, address FROM patients WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT provider_name, specialty, location FROM providers WHERE specialty='Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name, provider_name, service_date FROM patients JOIN services ON patients.patient_id = services.patient_id JOIN providers ON services.provider_id = providers.provider_id;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, address FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31';
SELECT * FROM patients
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE age > 30
SELECT * FROM providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology'
SELECT provider_name, location FROM providers WHERE location LIKE '%New York%'
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM providers WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE age < 25 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT provider_name, specialization FROM providers ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT service_name, cost FROM services WHERE cost > 100 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE patient_id=1;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE patient_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT provider_name, specialization FROM providers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT service_name, cost FROM services WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY cost DESC;

SELECT p.patient_name, pr.provider_name, s.service_name FROM patients p JOIN services s ON p.patient_id = s.provider_id JOIN providers pr ON s.provider_id = pr.provider_id WHERE pr.location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients;
SELECT provider_name, specialty, location FROM providers;
SELECT connection_id, patient_id, provider_id, service_id, connection_date FROM connections;
SELECT service_name, cost FROM services;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM providers WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY provider_name;

SELECT patient_name, provider_name, service_name, cost FROM patients JOIN connections ON patients.patient_id = connections.patient_id JOIN providers ON connections.provider_id = providers.provider_id JOIN services ON connections.service_id = services.service_id ORDER BY cost DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM services WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY cost ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT provider_name, COUNT(*) AS total_services FROM providers JOIN connections ON providers.provider_id = connections.provider_id GROUP BY provider_name ORDER BY total_services DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM patients ORDER BY patient_dob DESC;
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty FROM providers WHERE provider_specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT provider_name, service_name, provider_service_cost FROM providers p JOIN provider_service ps ON p.provider_id = ps.provider_id JOIN services s ON ps.service_id = s.service_id;

SELECT patient_name, provider_name, service_name FROM patients pa JOIN patient_provider pp ON pa.patient_id = pp.patient_id JOIN providers pr ON pp.provider_id = pr.provider_id JOIN provider_service ps ON pr.provider_id = ps.provider_id JOIN services se ON ps.service_id = se.service_id;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 2;
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty FROM providers WHERE provider_specialty = 'Cardiology';

SELECT patient_name, provider_name, service_name, provider_service_cost FROM patients JOIN patient_provider ON patients.patient_id = patient_provider.patient_id JOIN providers ON patient_provider.provider_id = providers.provider_id JOIN provider_service ON provider_service.provider_id = providers.provider_id JOIN services ON provider_service.service_id = services.service_id;

SELECT patient_name, patient_dob, provider_name, service_name, provider_service_cost FROM patients JOIN patient_provider ON patients.patient_id = patient_provider.patient_id JOIN providers ON patient_provider.provider_id = providers.provider_id JOIN provider_service ON provider_service.provider_id = providers.provider_id JOIN services ON provider_service.service_id = services.service_id WHERE patient_provider.provider_id = 1;
